Room.Name: Servant's Stairwell
Room.ShortDescription: This is the third floor of Prince Rutger's castle.
Room.LongDescription: The third floor is where many of the high level warriors and adventurers who have pledged their loyalty to Rutger have taken residence. There are storage rooms available for those who spend little time in the castle as well. There is a window here, where you can the countryside to the west of the castle. You seem to be very high in the air, as you look out.
